info.name: Settings Module
info.description: API endpoints for global settings management including site-wide configuration and settings

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{
  "siteName": "Updated TechRepair Solutions",
  "siteDescription": "Professional technology repair services with 24/7 support",
  "logo": {
    "url": "https://example.com/updated-logo.png",
    "publicId": "updated-logo-id",

    "height": 60,
    "format": "png",
    "size": 25000
  },
  "favicon": {

    "width": 32,
    "height": 32,
    "format": "ico",
    "size": 5000
  },
  "contactInfo": {
    "email": "contact@techrepair.com",
    "phone": "+1-555-987-6543",
    "address": "456 Updated Tech Street, New City, State 54321",
    "workingHours": "Mon-Fri: 8AM-7PM, Sat-Sun: 9AM-5PM"
  },
  "socialMedia": {
    "facebook": "https://facebook.com/updatedtechrepair",
    "twitter": "https://twitter.com/updatedtechrepair",
    "instagram": "https://instagram.com/updatedtechrepair",
    "linkedin": "https://linkedin.com/company/updatedtechrepair",
    "youtube": "https://youtube.com/updatedtechrepair"
  },
  "seo": {
    "metaTitle": "Updated TechRepair Solutions - Professional Technology Repair Services",
    "metaDescription": "Professional technology repair services for all your devices. Fast, reliable, and affordable solutions with 24/7 support.",
    "metaKeywords": "technology repair, phone repair, computer repair, electronics repair, 24/7 support"
  },
  "features": {
    "maintenanceMode": false,
    "allowRegistration": true,
    "requireEmailVerification": true,
    "enableContactForm": true,
    "enableBlog": false,
    "enableNewsletter": true
  },
  "isActive": true
}
